org.ptolemy.ptango.lib.webSocket

Interface WebSocketService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebSocketReader, WebSocketWriter

    public interface WebSocketService
    An interface for actors that handle WebSocket requests. The interface allows the relative path for the WebSocket request to be set and obtained, and provides a servlet to handle requests. If this interface is implemented by an actor or attribute in a model that contains an instance of WebServer, then requests to that server that match the relative path set by the setEndpoint(WebSocketEndpoint) method of this interface will be delegated to that actor or attribute.

    Since:
    Ptolemy II 11.0
    Author:
    Elizabeth Latronico and Edward A. Lee
    See Also:
    WebServer, WebServer
    Pt.AcceptedRating:
    Red (ltrnc)
    Pt.ProposedRating:
    Red (ltrnc)
